title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 9
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 9
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Cloudera (CLDR). Cloudera Inc.'s shares suffered their biggest one-day loss since the developer of data-analysis software made its initial public offering in April. The company put out its first earnings report since the IPO, and the results showed the amount billed to customers didn't increase as fast as many analysts expected.The shortfall outweighed earnings and sales that beat the average projections in a Bloomberg survey. Dave also discusses his Chart of the Day "S&P 500 technology, energy weight gap seen as too wide." Email Dave at DWilson@bloomberg.net to sign up for the Chart.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
